io.micronaut.configuration.couchbase

Interface CouchbaseSettings


  • public interface CouchbaseSettings
    Common constants for Couchbase settings. Note that this may not be the final names for these settings, this is just to get bootstrapping.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graham Pople

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String AUTH_DISABLED
      Prior to Couchbase Server 5.0, there was no Role-Based Access Control, so authentication should be disabled.
      static String PASSWORD
      The password of the Couchbase user that will be accessing the cluster.
      static String PORT_CARRIER
      The configuration port (carrier) to use for connecting to the cluster.
      static String PORT_HTTP
      The configuration port (HTTP) to use for connecting to the cluster.
      static String PREFIX
      The prefix to use for all Couchbase settings.
      static String URI
      The hostname of a Couchbase node in the cluster to connect to.
      static String USERNAME
      The username of the Couchbase user that will be accessing the cluster.

    • Field Detail

      • PREFIX

        static final String PREFIX
        The prefix to use for all Couchbase settings.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • URI

        static final String URI
        The hostname of a Couchbase node in the cluster to connect to.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • USERNAME

        static final String USERNAME
        The username of the Couchbase user that will be accessing the cluster.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PASSWORD

        static final String PASSWORD
        The password of the Couchbase user that will be accessing the cluster.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PORT_HTTP

        static final String PORT_HTTP
        The configuration port (HTTP) to use for connecting to the cluster. Usually only used in test or development scenarios.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PORT_CARRIER

        static final String PORT_CARRIER
        The configuration port (carrier) to use for connecting to the cluster. Usually only used in test or development scenarios.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • AUTH_DISABLED

        static final String AUTH_DISABLED
        Prior to Couchbase Server 5.0, there was no Role-Based Access Control, so authentication should be disabled. It also needs to be disabled during testing against the mock.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
